entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
